hero.title: fckingbreakfastclub
hero.subtitle: Authentic Asian Breakfast in the Heart of Berlin
hero.description: Experience authentic Asian breakfast dishes in the heart of Berlin, where traditional flavors blend with modern community dining.

menu.title: Our Menu
menu.description: Discover our carefully crafted Asian breakfast specialties
menu.menuDescription: Every dish is crafted with love using traditional techniques and the finest ingredients. From family recipes passed down generations to innovative fusion creations that honor both cultures.
menu.studentDescription: Show your student ID and enjoy special pricing on our entire menu
menu.noFeaturedItems: No featured items available at the moment.
menu.openKitchen: Watch our chefs prepare your meal in our open kitchen using authentic methods passed down through generations.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: A visual journey through our dishes and atmosphere

events.title: Community Events
events.description: Join our weekend events that blend traditional Asian breakfast culture with Berlin's vibrant community spirit. Every gathering is a chance to connect, learn, and taste something amazing together.

press.title: In the Press
press.description: What people are saying about us
